alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 05 at 8:06PM PST until January 07 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph. Higher gusts to 70 mph on ridge tops and other exposed locations. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. Strongest wind gusts on the desert slopes. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Difficult travel for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow accumulation above 4000 feet could result in slippery roads and locally hazardous travel early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
